name: Make Friends??
description:
You've just moved into a new neighborhood and hope to get to know the people in it. Try to impress your prospective friends by reading their mood and waving at them appropriately — too little and they'll think you're a snob, too much and they'll think you're just creepy!

THE NERDS WHO MADE THE GAME AND FORGOT TO UPLOAD IT AT THE END OF GGJ'17

Justin Capcap - Code

Keana Almario - Art

Background Music: Persona 3 OST Joy
